ygData.subject: Re: Ok I'm new here, but I hoped that I'
ygData.msgSnippet: Welcome to the world of Norrath, Lady DM. Here s a post I wrote over the summer that was for someone just starting the game. It s a two-parter:
ygData.messageBody:
Welcome to the world of Norrath, Lady DM. Here's
a post I wrote over the summer that was for someone
just starting the game. It's a two-parter:
<a href=http://messages.clubs.yahoo.com/clubs/theeverquesttavern/bbs?action=m&tid=theeverquesttavern&sid=12182229&mid=1748 target=new>http://messages.clubs.yahoo.com/clubs/theeverquesttavern/bbs?action=m&tid=theeve
rquesttavern&sid=12182229&mid=1748</a><br><br>To answer your other questions, you will need to buy
an account. You could always ask your friend for his
password and see what happens . . . but I wouldn't suggest
that. They'll cancel your account for that, if he comes
back and starts using it.<br> <br>Try this page:
<a href=http://everquest.station.sony.com/support/accounts_billing/billing_issues.jsp target=new>http://everquest.station.sony.com/support/accounts_billing/billing_issues.jsp</a> at the official site. Or, you could email them
here: accounts@... There's a phone number,
but I can't find it right now. But if you call, you
should be able to subscribe over the phone. You'll need
a credit card, of course.<br><br>The only other
helpful suggestion is that if you value your time, you
might want to _not_ install the game. If you at all
like fantasy and computer games, you won't come out
for a long time.<br><br>Kharlisht of Kaladim<br>Rogue
of 27 seasons<br>Drinal<br>Specializing in
backstabbing, corpse recovery, and Butcherblock Mountains guide
service
